title: [Question] Who is the most successful PES Alumni you have come across?
content: Not talking about the FAANG people in San Francisco Bay Area, but people who have been insanely successful through Software Engineering etc.

comments.body: Rishikesh SR ( the cofounder of Rapido)
I'm nowhere near being the most successful ðŸ˜­. I'm just relatively well known.

There are several prominent individuals who have graduated from PES University, Bangalore, making names for themselves in various fields.
Entrepreneurs and leaders
SR Rishikesh: Co-founder of Rapido Bike Taxi Services.
Mekin Maheshwari: Founder of Udhyam.org and previously headed Digital Media and payments at Flipkart.com.
Sudarshan Mogasale: CEO of Dassault Systemes Solutions Lab (formerly 3DPLM) and leader of Dassault SystÃ¨mes R&D in India.
Chirantana Mysore: Founder and Director of FreshersCareer.co.in.
Manish Singh: CEO of Innovators Bay, a company featured among CIO Review's 20 Most Promising Machine Learning Startups.
Pavan Kumar: A notable Kannada film director known for crowd-funding his films.
Shreyas Srinivasan: Director at OML Digital and co-founder of NH7, a prominent Indian indie music company. 
Other notable alumni
Priyanka Arul Mohan: An actress in the Tamil film industry.
Pawan Kumar: A movie director in the Kannada film industry.
Shreyas G Hosur: The first Civil Servant from Karnataka to complete the IRONMAN Triathlon.
Mrinal Kalakrishnan and Jnaneshwar Das: Robotic Scientists with publications and leadership in robotics research.
Adarsh Jagannatha: An entrepreneur and a PhD candidate at IIT-Kanpur.
Suhas Gopinath: Recognized as the world's youngest CEO.
Anil Muppalla: A researcher and hacking enthusiast.
Saad Hashim: Executive Director at Goldman Sachs.
Parul Gupta: Co-founder of Springboard.
Sumiti Tayal: Assistant Vice President at Tech Mahindra.
Nasika Bilkhis: Product Manager at SAP Labs.
Deepti Ramesh: Marketing Consultant at Hindsyght.
Sumeet Varma: Known as the highest-rated coder from India.
Zarana Parekh: Selected for the Veterbi Program and an Anita Borg Scholar.
Dhruvi Shah: Held internships at Google and Goldman Sachs and works as an Analyst with Morgan Stanley.
Aditi Bhatnagar: Participated in the Red Hat organized competition, Outreachy.
Gaurav Vaz: A bass guitarist, artist manager, writer, product evangelist, and web developer.
Kalyan Verma: A wildlife photographer and filmmaker.
Suresh Narasimha: Entrepreneur and Founder CEO of TeliBrahma.
Dr. Girish Bharadhwaj B: Awarded the Padma Shri by the Government of India.
The taxi driver was told by jawahar in new york.
Even if you are using ChatGPT, please format your answer. Also I'd highly recommend fact checking this and not trusting AI slop.
yes, she is director,strategic initiatives pesu
